description: This is package information that is needed for a source directory by afwdev and related development tools.

brief.description: This is a brief description of this source directory.
brief.label: Brief

buildType.description: This is the type of build used for this source directory. Specify 'afwmake' for c source directories.
buildType.label: Build Type

ignore.description: If true, afwdev will ignore this source directory.
ignore.label: Ignore

optionalChoiceDefault.description:
If specified, processing this source directory is optional and the value of this property is the default. If this property is not specified, this source directory is always processed.

If this is buildType 'afwmake', either an --enable-<var> or --disable-<var> will be available on ./configure where <var> is the value of the 'id' property with 'afw_' removed if present and underscores ('_') replaced with dashes ('-').
optionalChoiceDefault.label: Optional Choice

prefix.description: This is the prefix that is commonly used for source files in this source directory. This is most commonly the corresponding 'srcdirs' property name followed by an underscore ('_'), which is also its default.
prefix.label: Prefix

produces.description:
This is the name of what this source directory produces as known to the buildType.

For buildType 'afwmake', this starts with 'lib' for libraries.
produces.label: Produces

srcdirPath.description: This is the relative path in the repository for this source directory. This defaults to the corresponding 'srcdirs' property name.
srcdirPath.label: Srcdir Path

version.description: This is the current version of this srcdir. The default is the package version. The form must be <MAJOR>.<MINOR>.<PATCH> as defined at http://semver.org.
version.label: <MAJOR>.<MINOR>.<PATCH>
